title: Total protein in microalgae: Pierce BCA protein assay
title_html: Total protein in microalgae: Pierce BCA protein assay

protocol.title: Total protein in microalgae: Pierce BCA protein assay
protocol.title_html: Total protein in microalgae: Pierce BCA protein assay

source.description: Calculate the volume to obtain enough biomass for the assay (see guidelines)
Fold filter in quarter and place into an MP biomedical bead tube.

source.body:
• Use 2 ml bead tube for 25 mm filter; 15 ml bead tube for 47 mm filter
  • Large ceramic beads are recommended for diatoms and larger phytoplankton cells (2 mL: MP116913500/ 15 mL: MP116933050)
  • Small yttrium beads are recommended for picoplankton (2 mL: MP116960100/ 15 mL: MP116975050)

source.description: Use 5 inches Hg to filter microalgae samples onto polycarbonate filters (pore size varies).
Flash-freeze tubes in thermo flask with liquid nitrogen

Store at
until further processing

In order to obtain compatible results, prepare sufficient PSB so that the same PSB can be used for sample extraction, blank filter extraction and standard solutions
(1) Extract all samples: Each sample requires 0.25 mL PSB
(2) Extract all blank filters: Each filter requires 0.25 mL PSB
(3) Each standard solution (500 ul) requires 0.125 mL PSB
For each 10 g PSB

Use antistatics weighing dish to weigh the following chemicals:
(1) 0.136 g Tris base
(2) 0.133 g Tris HCl
(3) 0.8 g Lithium dodecyl sulphate
Place a plastic beaker on the top of the scale surface
Tare the total weight of beaker and tube
Remove the cap of a 15 mL tube and sit it in the beaker

Transfer all chemicals weighed in
into the tube, rinse the dish with small amount of milliQ water to make certain all of the solute is tranferred into the tube
Use a transfer pipet to add 4 g glycerol into the tube
Add 40 ul 0.5 M EDTA into the tube
Top to 10 g with milliQ water
Mix by vortex or shaker until all solute is completely dissolved.

source.body: Pefabloc is a protease inhibitor, and it loses activity over 24 hours.

source.description: Add 20.86 mL milliQ into 100 mg Pefabloc to obtain a final concentration of 20 mM.
Aliquot into 2.5 ml portions and keep frozen at
The solution can be frozen~thawed multiple times.

Prepare protein extraction buffer (PEB):
In each 1 mL PEB:
250 ul PSB
20 ul 20 mM Pefabloc
730 ul milliQ water
If samples are in cryo tubes instead of bead tubes
Rinse forceps with 70% ethanol and air dry
Label bead tubes and add 1 mL PEB into each bead tube.

source.body: Volume of PEB varies due to the actual biomass collected (see guideline)

source.description: If samples and blank filters are in bead tubes, add 1 mL PEB to each tube directly.

source.body: Volume of PEB varies due to the actual biomass collected (see guideline)

source.description: Prepare ice-bath, keep all samples in the ice-bath
Use clean forceps to transfer samples and blank filters into its corresponding bead tube.
Turn on FastPrep
Check the cap of each tube to make certain cap is tightly screwed. Organize the tubes in order, take notes of the position of each tube, in case the labels get rubbed out during extraction.
Run 1 min at 6.5 m/s

Keep tubes
for
Check labels. Put tubes back into FastPrep.
Run 1 min at 6.5 m/s

Keep tubes
for
Check labels. Put tubes back into FastPrep.

Keep tubes
for
Check labels. Put tubes back into FastPrep.
Run 1 min at 6.5 m/s
Run 1 min at 6.5 m/s

Keep tubes
for
Turn on refrigerated centrifuge
Centrifuge tubes at
Transfer 100 ul supernatant to a 600 ul microtube

source.body:
Sample volume for Pierce BCA is 25 ul for each assay. Considering that sample is dispensed into microplate by reverse pipetting, it requires at least 100 ul to dispense 2X25 ul sample.
If triplicate is preferred, transfer 150 ul supernatant.

source.description: Freeze both the supernatant and the rest at

source.title: Prepare Bovine serum albumin (BSA) standard solutions
Prepare Bovine serum albumin (BSA) standard solutions

source.description: Thaw 20 mM pefabloc and transfer 150 ul to a 600 ul mcirotube. Put the rest of the stock back into the freezer immediately.

source.title: Prepare Bovine serum albumin (BSA) standard solutions

source.description: Organize eight 1.7 mL microtubes in the tube rack, label the tubes from SD1 to SD8.

source.title: Prepare Bovine serum albumin (BSA) standard solutions

source.description: Use 0.5 mL Finntip Stepper Tip to dispense 10 ul pefabloc into each microtube

source.body: Wipe or dab the liquid drop on the outside of the tip, avoid wiping the tip open before dispensing the liquid.

source.title: Prepare Bovine serum albumin (BSA) standard solutions

source.description: Use 1.25 mL Finntip Stepper Tip (Thermo Fisher 9404180) to dispense 125 ul PSB into each microtube.

source.title: Prepare Bovine serum albumin (BSA) standard solutions

source.description:
Add milliQ into each microtube according to the sheet below:
ABCDEF
1 Standard Pefabloc (20 mM) (µL)PSB (µL) MQ (uL) BSA (2mg/mL) (uL) Final Conc. (mg/mL)
2 SD1 10 125 365 0 0
3 SD2 10 125 360 5 0.02
4 SD3 10 125 353 12 0.048
5 SD4 10 125 340 25 0.1
6 SD5 10 125 315 50 0.2
7 SD6 10 125 265 100 0.4
8 SD7 10 125 165 200 0.8
9 SD8 10 125 115 250 1

ABCDEF
1 Standard Pefabloc (20 mM) (µL)PSB (µL) MQ (uL) BSA (2mg/mL) (uL) Final Conc. (mg/mL)
2 SD1 10 125 365 0 0
3 SD2 10 125 360 5 0.02
4 SD3 10 125 353 12 0.048
5 SD4 10 125 340 25 0.1
6 SD5 10 125 315 50 0.2
7 SD6 10 125 265 100 0.4
8 SD7 10 125 165 200 0.8
9 SD8 10 125 115 250 1

source.title: Prepare Bovine serum albumin (BSA) standard solutions

source.description: Break the ampule of BSA standard

source.title: Prepare Bovine serum albumin (BSA) standard solutions

source.description: Reverse pipet certain amount of BSA (2 mg/mL) into each tube according to the sheet

source.body: Wipe or dab the liquid drop on the outside of the tip, avoid wiping the tip open before dispensing the liquid.

source.title: Prepare Bovine serum albumin (BSA) standard solutions

source.description: Vortex each tube.

source.title: Prepare Bovine serum albumin (BSA) standard solutions

source.description: Dispense 4 uL of each standard solution onto microdrop plate.

source.title: Prepare Bovine serum albumin (BSA) standard solutions

source.description: Read absorbance of eight standard solutions at 205 nm

source.title: Prepare Bovine serum albumin (BSA) standard solutions

source.description: Subtract absorbance at 205 nm of blank standard from the 205 nm measurements of all other standard solutions

source.title: Prepare Bovine serum albumin (BSA) standard solutions

source.description: Plot the blank-corrected 205 nm measurement for each standard solution versus its concentration in mg/ml.

source.title: Prepare Bovine serum albumin (BSA) standard solutions

source.description: If the standard curve has good Coefficient of Determination, i.e. R2>0.99, the standard solutions are in good quality; otherwise, prepare a new series of standard solutions until the quality of standard solutions passes the screen.

Use the following formula to determine the total volume of WR required. Consider several mL of extra volume since Finntip stepper is unable to expel the entire volume from the tip
(# standards + # samples + # blank filters) X (# replicates) X (200 ul) = total volume WR required
Prepare WR by mixing 50 parts of BCA reagent A with 1 part of BCA Reagent B in a 50 mL falcon tube
Turn on incubator and preheat to

Prepare 96-well microplate and lid:
Each microplate can load eight standard solutions and forty samples+blanks, duplicated
Reverse pipette 25 ul of each standard or sample/blank replicate into the microplate well.
Use 2.5 mL Finntip stepper tip to load 200 ul WR to each well.

source.body: Wipe or dab the liquid drop on the outside of the tip, avoid wiping the tip open before dispensing the liquid.

Dispense WR column by column.
Refill the stepper in between two columns of wells.

source.description: Cover plate with lid.

Shake and incubate at
for
Read absorbance at 562 nm
Put plate back into incubator. Shake and incubate for another
Read absorbance at 562 nm
Subtract the average 562 nm absorbance measurement of the blank standard replicates from the 562 nm measurements of all other individual standard.
Subtract the average 562 nm absorbance measurement of the blank sample (filter) replicates from the 562 nm measurements of all other individual sample.
Prepare a standard curve by plotting the average Blank-corrected 562 nm measurement for eash BSA standard versus its concentration in mg/ml.

source.body: If using cruve-fitting algorithms associated with a microplate reader, a four-parameter (quadratic) or best-fit curve will provide more accurate results than a purely linear fit.

source.description: Use the standard curve to determine the protein concentration of each unknown sample by using its blank-corrected 562 absorbance.
Protein_mg/filter = Protein_mg/mL X PEB_mL

description:
Here we describe a protocol for extracting total protein from microalgae and quantifying total protein by Pierce BCA protein assay.
https://assets.thermofisher.com/TFS-Assets/LSG/manuals/MAN0011430_Pierce_BCA_Protein_Asy_UG.pdf
